CustomField.formula: IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'アイウエオ')<> 0, 'ア', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'カキクケコガギグゲゴ') <> 0, 'カ', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'サシスセソザジズセゾ') <> 0, 'サ', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'タチツテトダヂヅデド') <> 0, 'タ', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'ナニヌネノ') <> 0, 'ナ', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'ハヒフヘホバビブベボパピプペポ') <> 0, 'ハ', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'マミムメモ') <> 0, 'マ', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'ヤユヨ') <> 0, 'ヤ', IF(FIND(Person_Name_Last_Kana_1st__c,'ワヲン') <> 0, 'ワ','')))))))))
CustomField.label: 姓カナの1文字目ア段
